issue.title: Average Response time based on time
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

The idea is to implement a ressource that would return aggregated logs on a specific period of time -> a unique tuple should be return. It is needed in order to get disponibility and average response time for specific period of time.

Probably, this could be done by adding a new GET parameter in aggregated logs, something like :

performAverage=true/false.
